game.name: Voxel Bot
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this game, the player controls a cubicle robot, who starts each game on a grid of cubes and moves by hopping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to purple allows the player to progress to the next stage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this game, the player controls a cubicle robot, who starts each game on a grid of cubes and moves by hopping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to purple allows the player to progress to the next stage.

reviewHighlights.text: If you ever played Q-Bert than you love this game, same concept but different levels some easy some very challenging all you use is your arrow keys to...
[strike]Q*Bert[/strike] Voxel Bot is another free Nannings game... oh wait, it's not free on Steam. Nannings makes this free on several websites, but...
